name: Light (itch) (GameWithLove)
description:
This is my intake assignment for my application to Breda University of Applied Sciences. The project was submitted Jan 18, 2023. There are still many things I would like to do to it.

You are a lone soul in a dark world. A familiar voice guides you while reminiscing and commenting on your surroundings. Find the exit to each stage before you run out of light. There are 2 exits to every stage - breeze through on the easy path or challenge yourself the harder path.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys to move. Bounce against a wall to stick to it. While on a wall - press up to jump high, away (left/right) to jump long, and down to drop off without moving too much.

On the title screen, mouse click to select a mode.

---

Background images from Justin Prno at https://dribbble.com/hi_jmp
Built upon the BUas template.
